name: Creatura
description: Seed, Breed, Create. From single cell organisms to complex ecosystems. Evolve every part of your own unique aquarium / terrarium by applying realistic principles of natural and artificial selection, in Creatura - ultimate Virtual Evolution Vivarium Simulator.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core, AMD Phenom Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 / OpenGL 4.3 compatible DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel iX, AMD Ryzen Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 / Vulkan compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
